title: Dogcopter 6: Til Death Do Us Bark: I Now Pronounce You Man and Woof
description: Dogcopter is on the case, now fighting crime with his partner in work and life, Drew.
quote: The mail truck is a decoy. Good boys chase the blue car. Be a good boy, Dogcopter.
altHero: a dog with helicopter blade extending from his back flies over a car, two mechanical arms hold a box and a bomb
alt1: a car with a dog on the roof chases a blue car and a mail truck
alt2: a dog drives a car with another dog (dogcopter) on the roof
alt3: dogcopter throws the bomb off a bridge as it starts to explode
alt4: Drew the dog licks his snout as a set of hands holds open a ring box
